snippet.title: 11 of the most beautiful office buildings in the world
snippet.content:
Plenty of office buildings are boxy and uninspiring, but every now and then they border on being works of art.
Ahead of the World Architecture Festival this November, the WAF has for the most beautiful office buildings in the world.
They hail from all over the world - from India to Sweden to Australia - and they encompass a range of styles.
These are the buildings that might make long commutes just a little bit more gratifying.
